Fresh_Apple.tips: Store away from other fruits to prevent ripening

Fresh_Banana.storage: Store at room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate
Fresh_Banana.tips: Keep away from other fruits, wrap stem in plastic
Fresh_Banana.signs_of_spoilage: Black spots, mushy texture, strong odor

Fresh_Beef.tips: Store on bottom shelf to prevent cross-contamination
Fresh_Beef.signs_of_spoilage: Gray color, slimy texture, strong odor

Fresh_Chicken.tips: Store on bottom shelf to prevent cross-contamination
Fresh_Chicken.signs_of_spoilage: Gray color, slimy texture, strong odor

Fresh_Manggo.storage: Store at room temperature until ripe, then refrigerate

Fresh_Orange.storage: Store at room temperature or refrigerate
Fresh_Orange.tips: Store in mesh bag for air circulation

Fresh_Pork.tips: Store on bottom shelf to prevent cross-contamination
Fresh_Pork.signs_of_spoilage: Gray color, slimy texture, strong odor

Fresh_Potato.storage: Store in cool, dark, dry place

Fresh_Strawberry.tips: Don't wash until ready to use

Rotten_Apple.signs_of_spoilage: Mold, soft spots, wrinkled skin, strong odor
Rotten_Apple.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Banana.signs_of_spoilage: Black spots, mushy texture, strong odor
Rotten_Banana.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Beef.signs_of_spoilage: Gray color, slimy texture, strong foul odor
Rotten_Beef.waste_disposal: Double-bag in plastic and dispose in trash. Do not compost meat products.

Rotten_Carrot.signs_of_spoilage: Soft texture, white spots, mold, strong odor
Rotten_Carrot.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Chicken.signs_of_spoilage: Gray color, slimy texture, strong foul odor
Rotten_Chicken.waste_disposal: Double-bag in plastic and dispose in trash. Do not compost meat products.

Rotten_Cucumber.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Manggo.signs_of_spoilage: Mold, soft spots, wrinkled skin, strong odor
Rotten_Manggo.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Okra.signs_of_spoilage: Soft texture, mold, wrinkled skin, strong odor
Rotten_Okra.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Orange.signs_of_spoilage: Soft spots, mold, dry texture, strong odor
Rotten_Orange.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Pepper.signs_of_spoilage: Soft spots, mold, wrinkled skin, strong odor
Rotten_Pepper.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Pork.signs_of_spoilage: Gray color, slimy texture, strong foul odor
Rotten_Pork.waste_disposal: Double-bag in plastic and dispose in trash. Do not compost meat products.

Rotten_Potato.signs_of_spoilage: Green spots, soft spots, mold, strong odor
Rotten_Potato.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash

Rotten_Strawberry.signs_of_spoilage: Mold, soft spots, wrinkled skin, strong odor
Rotten_Strawberry.waste_disposal: Compost if no mold, otherwise dispose in sealed bag in trash
